query:
ALTER TABLE notification_reads 
DROP INDEX notification_customer_unique_idx,
ADD UNIQUE INDEX notification_user_unique_idx (notificationId, userId, userType),
DROP INDEX notification_reads_customer_idx,
ADD INDEX notification_reads_user_idx (userId, userType);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.4046de8efa3e --database SoKyCCsEmaEjcFkVqbEFR7 --execute ALTER TABLE notification_reads 
DROP INDEX notification_customer_unique_idx,
ADD UNIQUE INDEX notification_user_unique_idx (notificationId, userId, userType),
DROP INDEX notification_reads_customer_idx,
ADD INDEX notification_reads_user_idx (userId, userType);
